modShortDescription: Have you ever shot an arrow/bolt and then couldn't find it, knowing that it didn't break? Well, this 7DTD mod helps finding them a lil easier.
modDescription:
Have you ever shot an [arrow/bolt](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) and then couldn’t find it, knowing that it didn’t break? Well, this 7DTD mod helps finding them a lil easier. If they stick, they will have a green glow to them. It’s not a 100% guarantee that you will find them but it ups the odds quite a bit, especially at night.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Updated for A19.
* v1.1: Added all 3 spears to the mod.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/46y07zax5ko5mq5/O92%20Glowing%20Arrows%2C%20Bolts%20and%20Spears%20A19.rar?dl=1)** for A19  
**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/bdn4skn3o2afpsk/O92%20Glowing%20Arrows%20and%20Bolts%20v1.1.rar?dl=1)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17377-glowing-arrows-bolts-spears-updated/).

**Credits:** Outsida92
